description: Detects CLR DLL being loaded by an scripting applications Author: omkar72, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: CLR DLL Loaded Via Scripting Applications
query: (process.executable:(*\\wscript.exe OR *\\cscript.exe OR *\\mshta.exe) AND file.path:(*\\clr.dll OR *\\mscoree.dll OR *\\mscorlib.dll))
